JobFullDesc: The QA Manager is responsible for the test management and execution of highly complex enterprise-wide technology solutions consisting of multiple work streams and/or projects that support HF’s mission and goals. The incumbent is accountable for delivering test planning, test cases and execution at the domain level; provides team leadership; resource and budget management; technical, strategic and tactical oversight; prepares and presents reports and metrics; ensures that standardized methods and procedures are followed; and partners with Information Technology (IT), Test Strategy and Planning and business owners to meet the business objectives and priorities of the domain.Process and Delivery:Test planning and executionEnsure all strategic projects and operational projects meet the highest quality possible by following industry recognized testing methodologies and best practices.Provide oversight and overall test execution management of all system and integrated release testing in the domain, insuring alignment to project and release level testing.Provide oversight and input to test plans and test strategy creation.Support in the creation and management of regression test suite and drive automation of testing within the domain.Participate in test phase reviews with the business on a periodic basis. Assure proper hand-offs and walk-throughs with project stakeholders are completed.Oversight of development of test scenarios, test cases and test data for internal domains and external vendors.Accountable for requirements traceability, defect management, test execution and risk mitigation.Provide input to QA-related metrics in support of test execution.Enforce standard policies and procedures required by the QA department.Continuously promote, design and implement methods to improve quality of processes and products.Participate in phase gate reviews.Collaborate with the Application Development Domain leads, Technical Owners, Project Managers, Business Stakeholders, Technical Services and Business Analysts to ensure planning, execution and delivery is aligned.Assist IT and the Business in use and adaptation of QA methodologies and Test Tools.Communicate effectively (verbal and written) with IT and business partners.Participate in gathering data for Healthfirst Audits. People:Manage a team of test analysts aligned to the domain.Train and/or coordinate training for analysts within the testing domain.Assure test analysts remain up to date on new technology; organizational changes; industry/product news; SDLC changes; and department and project related information.Establish strategic and performance goals at a team and individual level that are aligned to the goals of Healthfirst.Manage resource deployment and overall coordination efforts to ensure projects are completed on schedule and within budget with quality outcomes. TechnologyDevelop and implement test automation roadmap across multiple channels including web, mobile, service layers, back-end, and integration.Understand performance & security concepts and work with teams for ensuring proper test coverage.Work closely with the DevOps Enablement team in defining and implementing Continuous Testing for applicationsUnderstanding of testing at all levels of the SDLC (data, middleware, front end) and exposure to trending technologies and platformsMinimum Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related fieldPrevious experience in managing a medium to large scale teamsStrong project management and cross-functional team management skills.Strong knowledge and background in Agile Testing environmentWorking knowledge of HPALM for requirements, test plans, traceability, defect management and test coverage reports.Familiarity with test automation and its appropriate use in the overall test strategy.Ability to express and organize thoughts, ideas, and information in a logical and understandable manner, both written and verbal, in relation to issues that fall within their scope of responsibility.Preferred QualificationsGood knowledge and working experience in healthcareKnowledge on claims processing will be an added advantage.Exposure to DevOps and how test automation is integrated in itAbility to work in a fast-paced, member-focused, dynamic environment with minimal supervision.Exposure to cloud technologies such as AWSWE ARE AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER.
